title: 064: Kadabra
author: Chris Taylor
description:
The spoon ISN’T REAL!!!! OMG no way – Kadabra lives in such torment it’s impossible to know it, unless you listen to this episode of Magmar Sucks

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword),  [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Dan

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Kadabra)
